review.title: “Energetic, Supportive, Corporate Experience”
review.pros: Pros – Opportunities for new guns.Learning Experience for beginners.Pressure free work.Friendly atmosphere across all departments.
review.cons: Cons – Amount of work is huge.Initial pays are a bit low compare to current Industry growth rate.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management should focus on strategic empowerment rather than ridicule policies.Encourage staff to be bold in work; that should be acknowledged in Salary/Perks/increment.Senior officials need to look after each & every staff member's problems/issues.
